pageContent: Context: To date, there is no Level 1 evidence comparing the efficacy of radical prostatectomy and radiotherapy for patients with clinically-localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Prostate cancer mortality projections reach a new high: With prostate cancer deaths projected to rise to their highest level in 20 years, some experts worry that changes to screening guidelines made in 2012 could be a factor
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32776531/
